question: Nupur Mallick was appointed as the Chief Human Resource Officer of which company?
explanation: Tata Sons has appointed long-time group employee Nupur Mallick as its new Group Chief Human Resource Officer. Currently, Mallick is director, Human Resources for Tata Consultancy Services in the UK and Ireland. She will take over from S. Padmanabhan who will continue to be executive chairman of Tata Business Excellence Group and head, Sustainability Group.
